entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:08 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
